Everett.Japanese Gulch: Japanese Gulch, is a 1,071-acre (4.33 km2) drainage basin located in Snohomish County, Washington. Within the drainage basin, the City of Mukilteo owns 147 acres of land including a dog park, waterfront access, open space, and a community garden. With its rich historical significance and intertwining trails it brings astonishing beauty to an increasingly urban area.
